1399310.name: Blades of Worlds Demo
1399310.description:
Currently the demo is a short demonstration of how the game's tutorial began. It is outdated now. It will be updated in May 2022. (Also the pictures and videos will be updated. Currently they are outdated heavily).

The game

In short, the game is:

  • A magical cold nature themed fantasy where you gather viewers like a real life streamer in order to save them from a bad influence
  • What if live streaming was the way of life, a natural thing. You use water powers as a streamer to move around fast around the world.

Streamer is a fantasy, action role-playing game with real life live-streaming influences.
